        private javafx.scene.shape.Sphere transformNode(javafx.scene.shape.Sphere shape,
                                                double latitude,
                                                double longitude)
        Transforms the latitude and longitude to JAVAFX coordinates
        Parameters:
        shape - shape to transform on
        latitude - degrees that ranges from -90 to 90 degrees
        longitude - degrees that ranges from -180 to 180 degrees
        Returns:
        Returns the transformed shape
